description:
Explore and navigate the world with confidence using Google Maps. Find the best routes with live traffic data and real-time GPS navigation for driving, walking, cycling and public transport. Discover over 250 million businesses and places – from restaurants and shops to everyday essentials – with photos, reviews and helpful information.

Navigate the world, the way that you want:
• Get to where you need to go with fuel-efficient route options
• Find the best route with real-time, turn-by-turn voice and on-screen navigation
• Save time with automatic rerouting based on live traffic, incidents and road closures
• Catch the bus, train and ride-share effortlessly, with real-time updates
• Find bike or scooter rentals to get around more easily

Plan trips and experiences effortlessly:
• Preview an area before you go (e.g. parking, entrances) with Street View
• Use Immersive View to experience what landmarks, parks and routes look like, and even check the weather so that you can be ready in advance
• Create custom lists of your favourite saved places and share with others
• Order delivery and takeaway, make reservations and book hotels
• Don't get lost with offline maps in an area with bad signal
• Search for local places and things to do, and decide based on user reviews and photos

Discover and explore like a local:
• Explore with confidence knowing 500 million users contribute and keep the map up to date each year
• Avoid the crowds by seeing how busy a place is before you get there
• Use Lens in Maps to see walking directions overlaid on the real world
• Filter restaurants by cuisine, hours, price, rating and more
• Ask questions about a place, from dishes to parking, and get quick answers

Some features not available in all countries or cities
Navigation isn't intended to be used by oversized or emergency vehicles

Know what's ahead on the road with the help from other drivers. Waze is a live map that harnesses the local knowledge of tens of millions of drivers around the world. Drivers safely and confidently reach their everyday destinations thanks to Waze map’s GPS navigation, live traffic updates, real-time safety alerts (including roadworks, accidents, crashes, police, potholes and more) and accurate ETAs.


Make your next drive more predictable and stress-free:
• Get there faster with real-time directions, accurate ETAs and automatic rerouting based on live traffic, incidents and road closures
• Even if you know the way, avoid surprises on the road ahead with safety alerts for accidents, crashes, roadworks, objects on the road, potholes, speed bumps, sharp curves, bad weather, emergency vehicles, railway crossings and more
• Steer clear of tickets by knowing where police and red light and speed cameras are located
• Share what’s happening on the road with other drivers by reporting live incidents and hazards
• Stay informed of upcoming speed limit changes, and keep your speedometer in check
• Know which lane to be in with multi-lane guidance
• See toll pricing and choose to avoid tolls along your routes
• Add road passes and vignettes for HOV lanes and restricted traffic zones
• Find petrol/fuel stations and prices and EV charging stations along your route
• Locate car parks near your destination
• Use voice-guided turn-by-turn navigation from a variety of languages, local accents and your favourite celebrities
• Plan your next drive by checking ETAs by future departure or arrival times
• Use your favourite audio apps (for podcasts, music, news, audiobooks) directly within Waze
• Sync Waze to your car’s built-in display through Apple CarPlay


* Some features are not available in all countries


* Waze navigation is not intended for emergency or oversized vehicles


You can manage your in-app Waze privacy settings at any time. Learn more about the Waze privacy policy here, www.waze.com/legal/privacy.

developer: GOLDLAB APPLICATIONS YAZILIM VE BILISIM ANONIM SIRKETI
description:
Navigation-Radar: Safe and Easy Travel with Advanced Maps

With Navigation-Radar, every journey becomes less stressful and more rewarding. Instead of worrying about wrong turns or poor signals, you enjoy confidence, safety, and freedom. The combination of map, navigation, and gps tools gives you control of your travel experience so you can focus on what matters most—getting there comfortably and on time.

Travel Smarter, Save Time

Avoid fines and stressful surprises with real-time alerts. The gps tracker, tracking devices, and hud display keep you informed of speed limits, radar zones, and hazards. This means fewer distractions, safer driving, and peace of mind on every route.

Stay Connected Anywhere

Don’t let a weak signal stop your adventure. With offline map support, you always have access to your planned route. Combined with organic map design, your navigation feels natural and reliable. The gps map camera helps you capture and review your journeys so you can always retrace your steps.

Maximize Every Journey

Find fuel, food, or hotels instantly with smart search. Save your favorite places, bookmark routes, and review your travel history through the gps tracker. Supported by tracking devices, hud integration, and layered organic map views, you travel with confidence knowing everything you need is at your fingertips.

Your Benefit

Navigation-Radar isn’t just about maps—it’s about giving you more freedom, safety, and efficiency. You save time, reduce stress, and enjoy complete control of your travels. With tools like the gps map camera, detailed maps, and precise navigation, your journeys become easier, smoother, and more enjoyable.

Download Navigation-Radar today and take control of your travel. Get there faster, safer, and smarter.

Your subscription automatically renews, ensuring you never miss a moment of enhanced app usage. However, you have the flexibility to manage your subscription settings and turn off auto-renewal at any time from your account preferences.

Privacy Policy: https://www.goldlabtechnology.com/privacy-policy.html
Terms of Use: https://www.goldlabtechnology.com/end-user-license-agreement/

Track my phone – Accurate Tracking, Simple Setup, Easy to Use

Stay connected to your devices and loved ones with Track my phone by GPSWOX. This powerful, easy-to-use app lets you track and locate your iPhone precisely, anywhere in the world. Designed for both personal and business use, Track my phone provides a complete solution for device tracking, task management, and instant communication.

Key Features:
- Precise GPS Tracking: Track your phone’s exact location in real time with reliable GPS accuracy, whether it’s nearby or miles away.
- Battery Efficiency: The app is optimized to use minimal battery power while ensuring accurate tracking, so you can stay connected without draining your device.
- Easy Setup and Use: Set up Track my phone in just minutes! The intuitive design makes it simple to start tracking with no technical expertise required.
- Works Anywhere: With global support, track your iPhone regardless of where it is. Track my phone provides reliable GPS tracking across all regions.
- Intuitive Interface: The user-friendly design makes tracking straightforward and easy, with all the information you need at a glance.

Enhanced Functionality for Business and Personal Use:
- Task Management: Access the Tasks tab to view, assign, and manage tasks for enhanced organization. Perfect for businesses and individuals alike.
- Secure Communication: Stay in touch directly within the app using the built-in chat feature, making it easy to coordinate and share updates.

Why Choose Find My Phone?

Track my phone by GPSWOX offers more than just tracking. Whether you need to locate a lost phone, monitor employees, or keep tabs on family members, this app provides everything in one convenient package.

- Real-Time Location Updates: View live location data from any device. Log in on another iOS device or computer to monitor and track your iPhone.
- Geofence Alerts: Set up specific areas on the map and get notified if your phone enters or exits those zones. Ideal for security, family tracking, or business needs.
- Location History and Reports: Access a full history of your device’s movements. Review trip details, distances traveled, and more to stay fully informed.

Ideal for Family, Business, and Personal Use

Track my phone is versatile enough for any tracking need. With its easy setup, accurate tracking, and additional task and communication features, it’s perfect for families looking to keep track of each other, businesses managing employees, and individuals wanting to secure their devices.

More Features:
- Utilizes GPS for highly accurate location data.
- Available globally with multi-language support.
- Free professional setup and 24/7 support from GPSWOX.

Start Tracking with Confidence

Gain peace of mind with Track my phone by GPSWOX. Whether you’re tracking your own device or managing a fleet, our app offers a simple, reliable solution for device tracking, security, and communication.

Download Track my phone now to experience seamless, accurate, and efficient tracking, anytime and anywhere.

Master Your Mobile Connectivity with 69M+ Towers Worldwide

Transform your mobile experience with FindTower, the most comprehensive cell tower locator app that puts the power of 69 million towers at your fingertips. Whether you're troubleshooting weak signals, planning travel routes, or optimizing your mobile setup, FindTower delivers precise tower locations and advanced network insights.

Key Features

Precision Navigation
Navigate directly to towers with our built-in compass feature. See exactly where to point your antenna or position your device for optimal signal strength.

Power Search Technology
Uncover hidden cell infrastructure using advanced carrier filtering. Our Power Search feature uses MCC/MNC codes and network type filtering to discover towers that standard searches miss.

Smart Phone Lookup
Get detailed carrier information for any phone number. Identify which network a number belongs to, perfect for understanding coverage patterns.

Best Carrier Analysis
Find the optimal carrier for your location with our intelligent analysis. Compare coverage, signal strength, and network performance across all major providers.

Interactive Tower Mapping
- View all nearby cell towers on an intuitive map interface
- Filter by carrier, network type (2G, 3G, 4G, 5G), and distance
- Tap any tower for detailed technical information including MCC/MNC codes, cell IDs, and signal strength

Advanced Network Analysis
- Real-time signal strength monitoring
- Network speed testing with detailed metrics
- Coverage pattern analysis and optimization recommendations

Professional-Grade Tools
- Street View integration for 3D tower visualization
- Auto-refresh functionality for dynamic tower discovery
- Geo-search capabilities for worldwide tower lookup

Perfect For Every User

Remote Workers & Digital Nomads
Find the best spots for video calls and reliable internet access. Never miss an important meeting due to poor connectivity.

RV Travelers & Outdoor Enthusiasts
Plan your routes with confidence, knowing exactly where you'll have cell coverage. Perfect for camping, hiking, and remote adventures.

Network Professionals & Technicians
Access detailed tower information, carrier codes, and technical specifications. Essential for field work and network optimization.

Why Choose FindTower Over Competitors

Unlike other tower locator apps that show basic coverage maps, FindTower provides:

- Actual tower locations with precise coordinates and technical details
- Advanced filtering by carrier, network type, and distance
- Professional tools for network analysis and optimization
- Global database of 69 million towers with regular updates
- Intuitive interface designed for both casual users and professionals

Premium Features for Power Users

Unlock advanced capabilities with FindTower Premium:
- Power Search with advanced carrier filtering
- Phone number lookup and carrier identification
- Street View integration for 3D tower visualization
- Auto-refresh for dynamic tower discovery
- Geo-search for worldwide tower lookup
- Compass navigation for precise tower targeting

Trusted by Professionals Worldwide

FindTower is used by network engineers, field technicians, and connectivity professionals who need accurate, reliable tower data.

Download FindTower Today

Join thousands of users who have transformed their mobile connectivity experience. Whether you're dealing with weak signals at home, planning a remote work setup, or exploring new areas, FindTower gives you the tools to stay connected.

Key Benefits:
- 69 million towers worldwide
- Real-time signal analysis
- Professional-grade tools
- Global coverage database
- Intuitive user interface
- Advanced filtering options
- Compass navigation
- Network optimization insights

Stop struggling with poor connectivity. Download FindTower and discover the power of precise tower location data. Your mobile experience will never be the same.

Create, import, export tracks with waypoints.  Supports offline maps, no time limits, no ads.

The main functions of the application:
- compatible with Apple Silicon MacBook.
- new fast engine from MapBox.
- convenient and fast loading of maps.
- support for UTM coordinate system.
- route planner.
- pedometer with viewing data for the last three months (steps, distance).
- determination of the height of any waypoint.
- search by address.
- search by coordinates.
- compass.
- processing and optimization of tracks.
- loading and unlimited storage of maps of the travel area.
- supports all import and export methods available for your device with services, friends and applications in .gpx format.
- color gradient for speed and height, if this information is in the imported track.
- color gradient for speed and height for recorded tracks.
- recording speed and altitude in the track.
- relief contours in outdoor mode
- extended track information: average and maximum speed, track duration by time and distance, number of waypoints and number of steps.
- different units of measurement: miles, kilometers, feet, meters.
- pedometer when recording a track and saving information.
- work in the background.
- viewing one or more tracks in any application mode, including the recording mode of another track.
- installation, editing, deletion of waypoints in any application mode and anywhere.
- the ability to adjust the quality of the track, distance filters, energy saving mode.
- export and import of tracks and waypoints to various services - Open Street Map and others.
- has a pointer to the target waypoint and shows the distance to it. Easy target waypoint selection in several ways.
- display of additional information on the screen - scale, coordinates, height, speed, number of steps.
- shows the current distance traveled by the track and the travel or walk time.
- has several map styles - satellite, streets, combo and dark.
- Supports dark theme .
- easy start and stop of tracking in several ways.
- the ability to continue any previously recorded or imported track.
- several modes of map orientation - by the heading of the phone, in the direction of travel, centering and to the north.
- Possibility of tilting the map with double pinch.
- quick and easy selection and viewing of saved tracks, waypoints and maps.
- speed and altitude graphs can be scaled and scrolled.
- in the settings link to the user manual .

- Terms of service: https://appsupport.store/terms/
- Privacy policy: https://appsupport.store/privacy/

In addition to satellite maps, there are 3D maps (showing 3D models of buildings), contour maps (showing coordinates in real time, longitude and latitude), and flat maps (showing global street information).

Put safety first with Famio.

Designed for your peace of mind, Famio keeps track of your loved ones so that you don't have to. Thanks to Famio, you will always know where they are and whether they need any help. 

What can you do with Famio?

- Locate your family members, kids, friends, and loved ones in real-time, at any time.
- See your loved ones' location history to make sure everyone is staying safe.
- Receive notifications when they arrive or leave home, work, or school.
- Create separate groups for family and friends.
- Get a heads up when someone's phone is low on battery, which can affect your communication.

Take your safety to the next level and focus on your day, knowing that everyone is doing well. Famio will keep you updated 24/7. 

Famio offers a variety of features that go beyond location tracking: 

- Emergency Alerts: Send an SOS message and your precise location to friends, family, and responders in one click.
- Map Reactions: Stay connected with quick reactions and emojis. 
- Private Chat: Share quick updates without leaving the app.
- Driving Mode: Build better driving habits and make sure your loved ones drive safely.
- Child Mode: Make Famio super easy and helpful for the little ones. 
- Data Breach Alert: Famio will ensure your internet safety and data protection. 

Are you always worrying about your loved ones' safety and waiting for their texts? Famio will ease your anxiety and help you stay on top of things. 

An extra safety measure never hurts. Download Famio now and stay in the loop 24/7!

Disclaimer
Please note that real-time location tracking relies on obtaining permission from another user to access their geodata.

The app offers the following subscription options:
- Weekly at $7.99 with a 3-day free trial; $29.99 per 12 weeks.
- Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours prior to the end of the current subscription period.
- The account is charged for renewal within 24-hours before the end of the current subscription period.
- Subscriptions can be managed by the user and auto-renewal can be turned in the user’s Account Settings after purchase.
- The cost of renewal is equal to the value that “Apple’s App Store Matrix” determines as the equivalent of the subscription price in $USD.
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.

Privacy Policy: https://myfamio.com/privacy-policy
Terms of Service: https://myfamio.com/terms-of-use

Locato is a powerful and reliable GPS phone tracker that allows you to track and locate your loved ones in real-time. With Locato, you can ensure the safety of your family and friends by knowing their exact whereabouts at all times. Our app provides real-time location updates, comprehensive location history, and smart geo-fence notifications to keep you connected with those who matter most.

Key Features:

Real-Time Location Tracking: Know the current location of your loved ones on a live map.
Accurate GPS Tracking: Find the exact location of your family members and friends in real-time.
Location History: Access past location data to see where they've been.
Geofence Zones: Set up geofence zones to receive notifications when someone enters or leaves a specific area.
Device Tracking: Find lost or stolen phones using another family member's registered device.
Place Alerts: Get notified when family members arrive or leave specific locations like home or school.
Privacy and Consent: Location sharing is only possible with mutual consent to ensure privacy.
How It Works:

Add your family members' phone numbers to the app.
They accept the invite and share their location.
Track their location on the map in real-time.
Why Locato?

Easy Setup: Simply add your loved ones by their phone number and start tracking.
Peace of Mind: Ensure your family members are safe at all times.
Lost Phone Recovery: Track your lost or stolen phone using the app.

Subscription Information:
Locato offers a premium subscription plan with additional features, including unlimited location alerts, extended location history, and an ad-free experience. AT Mobile makes it easy to move around Auckland. It helps you plan and track journeys across AT Metro bus, train and ferry services, or go by bike or on foot. Whether you are a frequent commuter, an occasional traveller or a new to Auckland explorer, join over 250,000 other users and take an easy journey around Auckland


Find your best route - Use the Journey Planner to find out how to get to your destination, and save your regular trips. Maybe you want to get there by bike or on foot? Journey Planner will show you walking and cycling journey options too. 
 
Real time departures - Save time by knowing when you need to be at your stop or station, and even track the live location of your service. Save your favourite stops and stations for quick access when you're out and about.


Enjoy an easy journey - Going somewhere new, or just want to relax on your journey? We'll let you know when it’s time to board or to get off.


Shared scooters and bikes - Check live location of scooters or bikes near you and unlock in the provider app. 


Car sharing - Check live location of shared cars near you and book it with the provider.


Manage your AT HOP balance - Don’t wait till you get home, check your balance on the go, find nearby top-up locations, and easily top-up.


Disruption alerts and info - Want to be kept up to date when services change? We’ll let you know when your frequently used routes or stops are disrupted, based on your travel using registered AT HOP cards. Or you can subscribe to the specific routes you use, at the time of day you usually travel. 


Train Line Status - Check how your train line is running before you head to the station, for any disruptions or delays. 


We're always working to improve the app to make it easier for you to get around Auckland. Please send us feedback in your reviews or via the "Contact Us" area in the menu - we'd love to hear from you.

Find your direction with style. Compass GPS – Qibla Finder turns navigation into an elegant, real-time experience. The accurate compass offers a clean and intuitive interface that’s both easy on the eyes and effortless to use. 

 

Whether you're exploring new paths or finding your way back, the digital compass delivers precise direction with style. No clutter, no confusion, just a beautifully crafted tool built for clarity, confidence, and control. Personalize your navigation with multiple stunning themes in the Qibla direction app. From sleek dark modes to vibrant modern designs, choose the look that matches your style. 

 

Discover True North, sharpen your navigation skills, enhance your way-finding, and also locate the Qibla for Muslim prayers. Enjoy the convenience of having this advanced GPS compass right on your device with the Qibla direction app. 

 

Key features of Compass GPS – Qibla Finder: 

Ø Digital Compass 

Ø Qibla Compass 

Ø Live Location 

Ø User-Friendly Interface 

Ø Night Mode 

 

Digital Compass: Navigate in style with a modern, innovative compass. View direction overlays on live maps, explore surroundings and personalize your look with multiple unique themes. 

 

Qibla Compass: Easily locate the Qibla for Muslim prayer times no matter where you are with our smart and accurate Qibla direction app. Featuring real-time direction, location-based accuracy, and a clean, elegant design, it’s the perfect tool for every Muslim on the go. Simple, reliable, and beautifully made. 

 

Live Location: Enhance your journey with Live Location in the Compass app. Track your position in real time, view your movement on the map, and share your location with others instantly. Whether you're exploring, meeting up, or staying safe, Compass keeps you connected and on course. 

 

User-Friendly Interface: Designed for speed and simplicity, our Compass GPS – Qibla Finder gives you instant, precise directions, North, South, East, or West, with just a glance. No clutter, no confusion, just a sleek, reliable tool that keeps you oriented wherever you go. 

 

Night Mode: Navigate Compass GPS – Qibla Finder comfortably in the dark with a stunning dark theme that reduces eye strain while maintaining crystal-clear visibility. 

 

Download now and experience the direction like never before! 

 

By using our app, you accept to our Privacy Policy and Terms of use.

You can use Speed Camera Radar to detect hazards on the road, such as speed cameras, red-light cameras, speed bumps, bad roads, etc.
The application uses a database of points filled with love by other users.

Find your country or region from the list, and you're good to go! You will see all the alerts on the map.
Turn on the detection, and the application will warn you when something on the way is about to spoil your day.
Not interested in some types of hazards? Filter them out on the preferences page.
Contribute! Rate down the hazard if you hadn't seen it or thumbs up if it's on the place. We will remove threats with low ratings as invalid.
Add you're highly welcome to add your own points if they are not in the database.

Be careful on the road and good luck!

The workflow of the application differs from the hardware radar detector. Hardware radar detector - is a passive receiver that does not block the signal to which it is set, but simply notify the driver of the presence in the field of the radar radio interference.
This application works differently: it uses a database of hazards previously detected by other users.

description:
To find Qibla direction, you don't need an internet connection! Low size app that shows 100% Qibla Direction worldwide. Simple & Smart Qibla compass.

100% Qibla Finder helps muslims to find Qibla direction all around the World. The direction of Kaaba in Mecca (Makkah) is pointed out with an arrow on the map, so that you can adjust your direction before you start your prayer.

You do not need internet to see where the Qibla is. 100% Qibla Finder shows you where the Qibla is even on offline mode with the help of its compass feature.

Your direction is located accurately through the GPS feature in the app.

You can re-detect your location with “Find my location” feature to be sure about directions.

You can share 100% Prayer and Qibla app on Facebook and other Social Networks with your friends.

You need to hold your phone on a flat surface and keep it away from electromagnetic fields and metal objects. If it is necessary, you can manually re-arrange your location by pressing the marker.

Additional features include:

- Select from various map or compass modes

- Customize your location marker

- Locate the nearest mosques to your current location

Download Qibla Finder 100% now!

GPS taxi meter app for those who earn by driving. Perfect for towing, shuttle buses, limo services or taxi drivers. Allows to setup unlimited number of tariffs, and charge for distance driven or time passed (or both). Provides trip extras management, so extras can be added or removed with one tap.

+UNLIMITED NUMBER OF TARIFFS. Each tariff allows to charge either for distance (miles or kilometers) or for time. It is even possible to charge for time only when speed drops under some configurable value.

+TRIPS LOG, STATS, RECEIPTS. Everything you need for billing and book keeping.  Filter by month or year. Search through the trips log with start/end address, notes.

+FLEXIBLE EXTRAS. You can define your extras in advance and add to the trip easily or you can add arbitrary extra amounts to the trip as you drive. You can review trip extras at any moment to remove or edit them.

+ONE TAP TARIFFS SWITCH. You can pick which tariffs to see in the tariffs switch panel and switch with one tap between them.

+CONFIGURABLE NUMBER OF DECIMAL PLACES IN TAXI FARE. Setup speedometer to show 1 or 2 decimal places in a taxi fare, or no decimals at all.

+SQUARE PAYMENTS AND PRINTING. Integrates with Square Point Of Sale app for secure  payments (including credit cards) and also for receipt printing. *Square integration requires in-app upgrade.

+SUMUP PAYMENTS. Integrates natively with SumUp payments/terminal provider so you use all of the payment types that SumUp provides without leaving the app.

+ FARE CALCULATOR. Estimate a trip price given a start and end address. Start a trip in the app and open turn by turn navigation in another app, or just review turn by turn routes in another app. Provide fare calculations (quotes) to your customers. From version 4.2 you can also create a taxi trip directly in the Fare Calculator > add/manage extras > adjust total and note in the receipt, collect payment, send the receipt - all without leaving the Fare Calculator screen.

+BUILT-IN SPEEDOMETER. As you often need to know the speed when you drive. 

+ UNIVERSAL APP. No need to pay twice! Taximeter works on iPhones and cellular iPads. All in retina graphics. Side by side and split view is supported on iPads, so you can run navigation apps side by side with taximeter!

+ BACKGROUND MODE! Taximeter automatically works in background when taxi trip is active. You can use other apps while taximeter does its job in the background!

FREE version provides you with 10 taxi trips. If you need more taxi trips please upgrade. If you've ever purchased the paid app or upgraded, please use "Restore purchases" button.

! You can use this app on your iPhone as well as on any cellular iPad. **App will not work properly on iPods and wifi only iPads as they don't have GPS (external GPS module is required). 

! Please note that as with all GPS apps, continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Hello,

* SailFreeGPS displays current location, course (COG), speed (SOG), max speed, Trip distance, speed average and magnetic compass.
* SailFreeGPS displays COG and SOG history (6h) to help you to see trim effect on your sails.
* SailFreeGPS filters GPS information for more accuracy (average of an amount of last measures you can set).
* SailFreeGPS can share your position, COG, SOG to your friends.
* SailFreeGPS helps you during Man OverBoard maneuver (MOB). It stores the location and lead you to it.
* SailFreeGPS displays your track on google map (48h).
* SailFreeGPS helps you during Regatta with its countdown timer and its departure line
* You can store up to 8 waypoints and activate a GOTO function with ETA (Estimated Time to Arrival computation)
* You can save/load track to/from GPX/KML file
* You can calculate distance and heading 
* You can use it on every boat, motor or sail boat.
* You can now activate an anchor alarm or a course alarm.

I am an amateur sailor who has decided to create this app after a Transatlantic cruise.
I add periodically functionalities to this app when I have some spare time.

Please send me an email for any question or problem : contact@sailfreegps.com

Encourage me to continue by subscribing to premium version.

List of features of Premium Version

Premium version DOES NOT CONTAIN ADS.

GPS INFO Tab:
* Doucle click on SPEED will reset trip, max and ags speed
* Long click on COURSE to display compass
* Double click on coordinates to display/hide position

Graph Tab:
* Double click COG graph to switch to full screen mode

MOB Tab:
* Displays of relative bearing of the MOB
* Displays of tack angles
* Double click graph to switch to full screen mode

Waypoint Tab:
* Up to 200 Waypoints
* Displays of relative bearing of Waypoint
* Displays of tack angles
* Double click graph to switch to full screen mode

Map Tab:
* Displays of SOG and COG (speed & course)
* Your track segments are displayed according to your speed

Anchor alarm:
* Anchor area can be a polygon and you can adjust its shape

Regatta Tab:
* "Gun Button" allows to round seconds to nearest minute
    Ex: 4:03 => 4:00 or 3:58 => 4:00
* Enter exact départure time up to the second
* Displays of time to kill/save continuing the same way (speed and course)
* Displays of ideal speed to cross the line at 0:00 on the same course!!!

Settings Tab:
* Displays reverse color (white on black back)
* You can select Hybrid map
* Select on which duration is calculated the speed scale of your track: last 5min, 15 min or all the track
* Select your tack angle value. It will be displayed on MOB and WAYPOINT tabs

Exit:
* Ask to save the track before Exit

Are you tired of uncertain taxi fares? Now, with the taxi meter APP, you can easily customize various parameters of the taxi meter, monitor vehicle speed in real time, and provide more convenient taxi services for your travel.
1. Personalized customization
The car meter APP provides you with comprehensive personalized settings. According to your needs, you can freely adjust the parameters of the meter, including starting price, mileage fee, time fee, etc. Whether it's a city trip or a long-distance trip, you can set it up according to local billing rules to ensure your metered fares are accurate.
2. Real-time speed display
The vehicle meter also provides a real-time speed display function, allowing you to know the current speed of the vehicle you are riding at any time. This not only provides you with more intuitive driving information, but also helps you evaluate travel time and road conditions, providing a better travel experience.
3. Convenient travel experience
The taxi meter APP is designed to provide you with more convenient and accurate metering services. Whether you are traveling for a short distance in the city or traveling to an unfamiliar place, the car meter will become your reliable assistant. By using a ride meter, you can ensure your fares are fair and reasonable and provide a better ride experience.
4. Simple and easy-to-use interface
The vehicle meter APP adopts a simple and intuitive interface design, allowing you to easily get started and quickly set the required parameters. Whether you are new to taxi service or an experienced user, the taxi meter provides you with a simple and easy-to-use operation interface to ensure that you can complete the required settings in a short time.
Download the taxi meter APP to experience a smarter taxi service! Make your travel more convenient and accurate, and say goodbye to uncertain billing methods. The car meter will take you to a better travel experience.

Speedometer Simple is a simple speedometer that is very easy to use. 

This app uses phone's GPS to accurately determine your speed.

Speedometer has large fonts and supports mph, km/h, and knots speed display. Optionally, city name and a compass can be shows on the screen. The app also shows the traveled distance. Average and maximum speed is displayed in an optional screen as well. Interface color can be set one of many pre-selected colors. Speedometer app can record the speed during your trips and provide post-trip statistics like maximum speed, traveled distance etc.

▷ iLocation is a tool to search and share location easily and quickly.

With iLocation, you can tell the current location or the specified location by several screen clicks. And if you want to know the coordinates or address of the current location, you can simply run iLocation.

When you want to explain an appointment, or when you need to know your current location in a hurry, you can also pin the map on top of the map and simply select the transport to share the location.

◉ Function

• Automatically display current location information when running App
• Coordinate and altitude display of current position or specified position
• Show the location's address
• Show compass bearing
• Change the map format (General, Satellite)
• Specify the center of the map and check the coordinates and addresses
• Specify coordinates by entering coordinates
• Specify an arbitrary location by entering an address (Pro)
• Save map to camera roll or clipboard
• Save your location to Favorites for reuse
• Save the specified location information and map or share it via SNS
• The location is sent to the URL so that the recipient can connect to the map immediately

If you have iLocation, you will be able to explain your location without having to talk.

◉ Notice

• This is a completely free app, so no payment or subscription is required.
• Depending on the user's location and environment, GPS signal reception may not be smooth or there may be differences in accuracy.
• This app cannot change your device's system GPS information.
• Since the content of banner ads is published by advertising agencies, we do not know or participate in the interaction between the ads and app users.

Plan, navigate and track your rides quickly and easily. Our active cycling community gives you access to millions of routes and cycle paths worldwide.

Turn your iPhone, iPad or Apple Watch into a bike computer. Including HealthKit integration.

Improve your cycling experience with customised routes - without time-consuming manual planning.

MILLIONS OF BIKE ROUTES
The most popular routes, MTB trails and cycle paths in your area and worldwide. Including official routes such as EuroVelo, the National Cycle Network, Cycle Superhighway, and many more.

POIs

MONTHLY & ANNUAL RECAP

INTEGRATIONS

INDIVIDUAL BIKE COMPUTER

DETAILED ROUTE PREVIEW

CRASH DETECTION
Safer cycling with automatic fall detection.

developer: Changsha Duyou Network Technology Co., Ltd
description:
Speedometer GPS: Speed ​​Monitor is a high-precision GPS speedometer that integrates speed monitoring, trip recording, HUD head-up display, speeding reminder and other functions. It provides real-time and accurate speed tracking and navigation assistance for drivers, cyclists, runners and outdoor explorers. Whether it is daily commuting, long-distance travel, or racing competition, this Speedometer app is your ideal choice!

Core functions

Accurate GPS speed measurement

Relying on high-precision GPS technology, it displays the current speed, average speed, and maximum speed in real time to ensure accurate speed measurement. Supports kilometer/hour (km/h) and mile/hour (mph) two unit switching.

Smart speeding alarm

Set a personalized speed limit value. Once the speed is exceeded, the application will issue an alarm to remind you, effectively preventing speeding and helping you drive safely. And it supports 4 preset speed limits, which can be switched with a single click, allowing you to operate more safely while driving!

HUD head-up display mode

After enabling HUD mode, place the phone under the windshield to project the speed information onto the windshield, making night driving safer.

Driving data record

Automatically record detailed data such as travel time, driving distance, stay time, altitude, etc. Allowing you to easily view historical travel data or share it.

Built-in map

The built-in map can display the current location in real time and draw the driving trajectory to prevent getting lost.

Picture-in-Picture Mode (PiP)

Enable Picture-in-Picture (PiP) mode to view speed information in real time while using other applications.
Suitable for scenarios such as navigation and music playback, so that speed measurement no longer affects other operations.
The window size and position can be adjusted to ensure the best visual experience while driving.

Altimeter & Altitude Measurement

Built-in accurate altitude measurement function, real-time monitoring of current altitude, suitable for mountain driving, cycling and outdoor adventures.

Speedometer helps you drive safely, accurately measure speed, and avoid speeding tickets! Download now to experience professional speed measurement service!

Free features:

The following core features are available without a subscription:

Real-time speed measurement

Remaining mileage statistics

Set maximum speed limit

Subscription features (premium features):

Unlock the full feature experience and obtain access through subscription:

Head-up display (HUD) mode

Picture-in-picture (PIP) mode

Map navigation integration

Driving data recording and statistics

Change speed dashboard style

Automatic renewal terms

Subscriptions will be charged to your iTunes account. Payment will be charged to the account immediately after confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. The account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, and the renewal amount will be determined. Users can manage or cancel subscriptions in "Settings" > "Apple ID" > "Subscriptions". After the free trial (if any) ends, the system will automatically start the subscription according to the selected plan unless canceled in advance.

Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/view/duyou-privacy-policy
Terms: https://sites.google.com/view/duyou-terms
